New Records: Virat Kohli equalled Kumar Sangakkara with his 118th fifty-plus score in ODIs
Virat Kohli now has the second-most fifty-plus scores in ODI World Cups with 13, behind Sachin Tendulkar
Key Match Events: Virat Kohli hit a run-a-ball fifty against Sri Lanka
Kohli and Shubman Gill stitched a 100-plus partnership
Dilshan Madushanka got the wicket of Rohit Sharma for 4 in the first over
Virat Kohli made the most of a missed opportunity from Dushmatha Chameera who dropped a return catch when Kohli was on 10
